short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you switch between search engines quickly and easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you're using one of the supported search engines, this extension embeds helpful links to other alternative search engines, with your latest search criteria, along-side the search bar!
Currently, we support four search engines: Google, DuckDuckGo, Ecosia, and Bing.

If you aren't interested in using certain search engines, you can disable them in the extension's pop-up.
